job_history.work_description: Reconcile various balance sheet accounts, perform primary liaison function for audits, review and analyze journal entries, and prepare month-end accrual journal entries.
Maintain financial records, analyze and reconcile G/L accounts, prepare financial statements, and coordinate with warehouse manager.
Manage and forecast funds, reconcile and settle, prepare monthly Profit and Loss reports, and analyze processing costs and network fees.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling balance sheet account reconciliations, G/L account reconciliations, and settling, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience with all aspects of accounting including financial record maintenance, journal entry analysis, and financial statement preparation, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Handled financial analysis tasks such as processing cost analysis, network fee analysis, and profit and loss reporting, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Acted as primary liaison for audits, showing a solid working proficiency in auditing.

skills.name: Financial Forecasting
skills.explanation: Managed and forecasted funds, indicating a solid working proficiency in financial forecasting.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records, preparing financial statements, and analyzing data, suggesting strong proficiency.
